comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when preview chart.
 
Build number:
2.2.0.v20061211-0630
 
Steps to reproduce:
1. New a sample data source dsource, new a data set dset: select * from 
   CUSTOMERS.
2. New a chart, Use Data Set: dset
   Category Series: row["CUSTOMERNAME"]
   Value Series: row["CUSTOMERNUMBER"]
3. Preview.

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.
 
Actual result:
Exception is  thrown out.
 
Error log: 
- Unable to render too many ticks. Please adjust the scale step or unit. 
exception.scale.tick.max ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.chart.exception.ChartException: Unable to render too many ticks. Caused by setting a maximum limitation in ticks computing.
Fixed by adding criteria for the limitation to ensure it only works in DateTime scale, so the limitation won?t affect category values.
